it comes from a pear package

I don't really want to say more than that, because it's not really fair for me to point my finger at the guy that wrote it--everyone makes mistakes, and nobody deserves to be singled out for a laugh at their own expense.

I'm pretty sure you'll be able to figure out where exactly it came from if you look hard enough.
Grepping for eval tends to be a pretty good way to find bogus code.
